content.p:
ยง 3385-a. Access to criminal history information. Upon such terms and
conditions as the commissioner of the division of criminal justice
services agrees, authorized employees of the department's bureau of
narcotic enforcement, designated by the commissioner pursuant to
subdivision two of section three thousand three hundred eighty-five of
this title, may access criminal history information in the central data
facility established pursuant to subdivision six of section eight
hundred thirty-seven of the executive law upon request to the director
of the bureau of narcotic enforcement demonstrating the necessity for
such access as part of an identified, ongoing criminal investigation.
Any information obtained as a result of such access shall not be
disseminated to persons not authorized to access such criminal history
information.
